title: Studio in Newer Community in NoHo, Open Layouts, Look & Lease Special!
posting_body: ['2 WEEKS FREE LOOK & LEASE SPECIAL', 'On-Site Tours Still Available by Appointment.', 'Art Set in NoHo.', '60 Units of Studio/Loft living in NoHo.', 'We are a family of seekers, doers, dreamers, wanderers, independent creators and curious human beings with a drive to explore all that this world has to offer.', 'The new place to live, work, and play in the heart of NoHo.', 'Art Set offers a modern take on luxury apartment living.', 'Art Set studios/lofts feature spacious floor plans for your comfort and convenience.', 'The lofts will offer flexible live-work space and consist of a range of amenities such as durable finishes, soundproofing and energy efficient design – polished concrete floors, utility sinks, and a communal workshop for resident artists, to name a few.', 'You’ll also appreciate our large closets, kitchens with refrigerators and electric ranges, in-home washers and dryers, and controlled access.', 'A state-of-the-art gym and rooftop pool-spa, that comes with calling Art Set your home.', 'Art Set is in the NoHo Arts District.', 'A community in North Hollywood, home to contemporary theaters, art galleries, cafes, and shops.', 'Art Set provides easy access to 101, 170 and 134 freeways and jump aboard the Orange/Red Metro line just walking distance away.', 'When you’re ready to explore further, give us a call and discover your new home at Art Set in NoHo.', 'We’re pet-friendly!', 'Dogs and cats are welcome, so be sure to pack Fluffy’s favorite scratching post and Fido’s favorite bone.', 'Bring your pet to work, since all our studio lofts are live/work lofts.', 'Fully furnished apartments are offered.', 'Please call for details.', '11525 Chandler Boulevard North Hollywood, CA 91601', 'Apartment Amenities:', '- High-Speed Internet and Phone Lines', '- Short Term Furnished Leases Available', '- Washer/Dryer', '- Lofts — 19 feet High with Mezzanine', '- Custom Fixtures and Finishes', '- Microwave', '- Open Layouts and Upscale Design Touches', '- Disposal', '- Spacious', '- Rear Yards*', '- Unique Studios and Lofts', '- Pre-wired for Cable and Satellite TV', '- Furnished Available', '- Refrigerator', '- Built-In Closets', '- Wheelchair Access', '- Loft with Mezzanine', '- Murphy Beds in Studios', '- Dishwasher', '- Over-sized Double Pane Windows', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '- Window Coverings', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Private Patios or Balconies', '- Polished Concrete Flooring', '- Designer Selected Wood Cabinets', 'Community Amenities:', '- Elevator', '- On-Site Management', '- Pool/Spa', '- Bike Racks', '- Package Receiving', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Recreation Room', '- Parking Garage', '- Business Center', '- Art Campus', '- Courtyard', '- Fitness Center', '- Assigned Parking', '- Free Weights', '- Rooftop Entertainment Patio', '- Rooftop BBQ/Picnic Area', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Sq.', 'Ft. may not be exact.', 'Price and availability may change.']
